vocabularies.name: Happy
vocabularies.definition: feeling or showing pleasure

vocabularies.name: Angry
vocabularies.definition: full of anger, displeasure

vocabularies.name: Sad
vocabularies.definition: feeling or showing sorrow; unhappy

vocabularies.name: Hungry
vocabularies.definition: feeling or showing the need for food

vocabularies.name: Tired
vocabularies.definition: in need of rest or sleep

vocabularies.name: Sandwich
vocabularies.definition: two pieces of bread with food such as cheese, salad, or meat between them.

vocabularies.name: Pizza
vocabularies.definition: a large circle of flat bread baked with cheese, tomatoes, and sometimes meat and vegetables spread on top.

vocabularies.name: Donut
vocabularies.definition: a small fried cake of sweetened dough, typically in the shape of a ball or ring.

vocabularies.name: Carrot
vocabularies.definition: a long pointed orange root eaten as a vegetable

vocabularies.name: Cake
vocabularies.definition: a sweet food made with a mixture of flour, egg, fat, and sugar

vocabularies.name: Hot dog
vocabularies.definition: a cooked sausage eaten in a long soft piece of bread, often with ketchup (番茄醬) or mustard（芥末醬）

vocabularies.name: Apple
vocabularies.definition: a round fruit with red, green, yellow skin and small seeds.

vocabularies.name: Banana
vocabularies.definition: a long, curved fruit with yellow skin and soft, sweet, white flesh (果肉）inside.

vocabularies.name: Broccoli
vocabularies.definition: a vegetable with green stalks(莖)and green top (表面).

vocabularies.name: bicycle
vocabularies.definition: a two-wheeled vehicle that you sit on and move by turning the two pedals

vocabularies.name: motorcycle
vocabularies.definition: a vehicle with two wheels and an engine

vocabularies.name: airplane
vocabularies.definition: a vehicle designed for air travel that has wings and one or more engines

vocabularies.name: bus
vocabularies.definition: a large vehicle in which people are driven from one place to another

vocabularies.name: train
vocabularies.definition: a railway engine connected to carriages for carrying people or to wheeled containers for carrying goods

vocabularies.name: truck
vocabularies.definition: a large road vehicle that is used for transporting large amounts of goods

vocabularies.name: boat
vocabularies.definition: a small vehicle for travelling on water

vocabularies.name: traffic light
vocabularies.definition: one of a set of red, yellow, and green lights that control the movement of vehicles, usually at a point where two or more roads join

vocabularies.name: fire hydrant
vocabularies.definition: a large pipe in the street that firefighters can get water from to use to stop fires from burning

vocabularies.name: stop sign
vocabularies.definition: a sign on the road that tells drivers of vehicles to stop and not to continue until it is safe

vocabularies.name: bench
vocabularies.definition: a long, usually hard seat for two or more people, often found in public places

vocabularies.name: horse
vocabularies.definition: a large animal with four legs that people ride on or use for carrying things or pulling vehicles

vocabularies.name: skis
vocabularies.definition: one of a pair of long, flat narrow pieces of wood or plastic that curve up at the front and are fastened to boots so that the wearer can move quickly and easily over snow

vocabularies.name: snowboard
vocabularies.definition: to slide on the snow by standing on a specially shaped board

vocabularies.name: cow
vocabularies.definition: a large female farm animal kept to produce meat and milk

vocabularies.name: backpack
vocabularies.definition: a large bag used to carry things on your back, used especially by people who go camping or walking

vocabularies.name: umbrella
vocabularies.definition: a device for protection against the rain

vocabularies.name: tie
vocabularies.definition: a long, thin piece of material that is worn under a shirt collar, especially by men, and tied in a knot at the front

vocabularies.name: frisbee
vocabularies.definition: a large, rectangular container with a handle, for carrying clothes and possessions while travelling

vocabularies.name: suitcase
vocabularies.definition: a large, rectangular container with a handle, for carrying clothes and possessions while travelling

vocabularies.name: fork
vocabularies.definition: a small object with three or four points and a handle, that you use to pick up food and eat with

vocabularies.name: spoon
vocabularies.definition: an object consisting of a round, hollow part and a handle, used for mixing, serving, and eating food

vocabularies.name: couch
vocabularies.definition: a long, usually hard seat for two or more people, often found in public places

vocabularies.name: kite
vocabularies.definition: a frame covered with cloth or plastic and joined to a long string, that you fly in the air when the weather is windy

vocabularies.name: chair
vocabularies.definition: a seat for one person that has a back, usually four legs, and sometimes two arms

vocabularies.name: potted plant
vocabularies.definition: a plant that is grown in a pot

vocabularies.name: bed
vocabularies.definition: a large, rectangular piece of furniture, often with four legs, used for sleeping on

vocabularies.name: toilet
vocabularies.definition: a room or small building in a public place in which there are several toilets

vocabularies.name: TV
vocabularies.definition: a system for transmitting visual images and sound that are reproduced on screens, chiefly used to broadcast programs for entertainment, information, and education.

vocabularies.name: laptop
vocabularies.definition: a computer that is portable and suitable for use while traveling.

vocabularies.name: surfboard
vocabularies.definition: a long, narrow streamlined board used in surfing.

vocabularies.name: tennis racket
vocabularies.definition: an object used for hitting the ball in various sports, consisting of a net fixed tightly to a round frame with a long handle

vocabularies.name: cup
vocabularies.definition: a small, round container, often with a handle, used for drinking tea, coffee, etc.

vocabularies.name: cell phone
vocabularies.definition: a phone that is connected to the phone system by radio instead of by a wire, and can be used anywhere where its signals can be received

vocabularies.name: microwave
vocabularies.definition: an electric oven that uses waves of energy to cook or heat food quickly

vocabularies.name: oven
vocabularies.definition: the part of a cooker with a door, used to bake or roast food

vocabularies.name: sink
vocabularies.definition: a bowl that is attached to the wall in a kitchen or bathroom in which you wash dishes or your hands, etc.

vocabularies.name: refrigerator
vocabularies.definition: a piece of kitchen equipment that uses electricity to preserve food at a cold temperature

vocabularies.name: book
vocabularies.definition: a set of pages that have been fastened together inside a cover to be read or written in

vocabularies.name: clock
vocabularies.definition: a device for measuring and showing time, usually found in or on a building and not worn by a person

vocabularies.name: vase
vocabularies.definition: a container for holding flowers or for decoration

vocabularies.name: scissors
vocabularies.definition: a device used for cutting materials such as paper, cloth, and hair, consisting of two sharp blades that are joined in the middle, and two handles with holes to put your fingers through

vocabularies.name: teddy bear
vocabularies.definition: a soft toy bear

vocabularies.name: toothbrush
vocabularies.definition: a small brush with a long handle that you use to clean your teeth
